answers.text:
Izzy- check OSHA as they have standards for office space, shared open space etc. - http://www.osha.gov/
Good luck,

author: Israel Murguia
text: Does anyone have a sample workspace standard policy for space allocation that can be shared? Thank you.
title: Space Standards for Offices and Systems Furniture
